StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProgramQsnChangeRequestData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaId int)
AS
SELECT CASE WHEN c.[COMPONENT_CODE] IN ('K4', 'K8', 'K9', 'B5') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsReservist ,p.[PROGRAM_CODE] AS ProgramCode ,p.[PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION] AS ProgramDescrip.on ,pt.[PROGRAM_TYPE_CODE] AS ProgramTypeCode ,pt.[PROGRAM_TYPE_DESCRIPTION] AS ProgramTypeDescrip.on ,q.[QSN_ID] + '/' + q.[MOS] AS Qsn FROM [dbo].[NWA] n WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[CONTRACT] c ON c.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY] pa ON pa.[CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PROGRAM] p ON p.[PROGRAM_ID] = pa.[PROGRAM_ID] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[PROGRAM_TYPE] pt ON pt.[PROGRAM_TYPE_CODE] = p.[PROGRAM_TYPE] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[QSN] q ON q.[CONTRACT_ID] = c.[CONTRACT_ID] WHERE n.NWA_ID = @NwaId
